verbose_text: Considering the fact that overactivation of NMDA receptors occurs in ischemia [XREF_BIBR], it is possible that NMDA mediated excitotoxicity may cause mitochondria independent, but Nox dependent, ROS production in cerebral ischemia / reperfusion injury.
evidence: NMDA-mediated excitotoxicity may cause mitochondria-independent, but Nox-dependent, ROS
